Articles.Content: So a while ago I decided to start experimenting with Kopernicus, and I managed to make a gas giant in an inclined orbit around Kerbol, but I'm not done. Any suggestions would be great!
I've been semi-temped to try to make an ice giant for some time. I don't recall seeing any of these the last time I looked - though its been quite awhile.

For your experimentation, I recommend checking out the Kopernicus Documentation: https://kopernicus.github.io/wiki/

There's a lot of super useful information in there.
Thanks for the suggestions guys, sorry I didn't see them earlier!
